abstract: A rally by labor unions and civic groups inspired by the Occupy Wall Street protests is planned for this weekend in Seoul, South Korea, The Financial Times' beyondbrics blog reports.
snippet: A rally by labor unions and civic groups inspired by the Occupy Wall Street protests is planned for this weekend in Seoul, South Korea, The Financial Times' beyondbrics blog reports.
lead_paragraph: "Occupy Yoido" may have an unfamiliar ring, but Yoido is the neighborhood in Seoul where South Korea's biggest financial institutions are based. A rally by labor unions and civic groups inspired by the Occupy Wall Street protests is planned for this weekend in Yoido, The Financial Times' beyondbrics blog reports. Read more »

headline.main: Wall Street Protest Finds a Seoul Sister
